thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Sara Bolio
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Sara Bolio

author: Sara Bolio
title: Sara Bolio
text:
My son was promoted to Colonel in the Army and I thought I would surprise him and his family with lobsters and steamers. I found the ad on line and called. I spoke to a very nice young man who was friendly and very helpful.
The lobsters arrived on Saturday as I asked. The lobsters and steamers were as fresh as can be and absolutely delicious. This couldn't have been a better gift. I would highly recommend Maine Lobster Now and plan on using them again.
